tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE competition_schedule (
  competition_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  competition_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  competition_date DATE NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  starting_time TIME,
  )

CREATE TABLE competition_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    competition_id INT,
    team_name VARCHAR(255),
    result VARCHAR(50),
    rank INT
);

CREATE TABLE competition_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    competition_id INT,
    team_name TEXT,
    winning_team BOOLEAN,
    points_scored INT
);

CREATE TABLE competition_results (
    result_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    competition_id INT NOT NULL,
    team_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    score INT NOT NULL,
    result_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (competition_id) REFERENCES sports_competitions(competition_id)
);

CREATE TABLE competition_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    competition_id INT REFERENCES competition_schedule(competition_id),
    team_name VARCHAR,
    score INT,
    result_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE player_stats (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR,
    games_played INT,
    goals_scored INT,
    assists INT
);
